Operationalising AI Governance

This document discusses the challenges and steps to implement AI governance using ISO 42001, NIST, and GDPR frameworks. It provides a roadmap for mapping AI use cases to GDPR, applying NIST AI RMF functions, building processes with ISO 42001, creating an AI oversight group, and testing and improving AI governance.
